name: PANAMEDIA, S.L
about: Panamedia International Flight School, based in Valencia, Mallorca, and Castellón, Spain, has been a pinnacle in aviation training since 1980. With over 44 years of experience, Panamedia offers a comprehensive range of courses, including the Integrated Airline Transport Pilot (ATPL) course, Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and various modular training programs. Students benefit from training at international airports, immersing them in real-world commercial aviation environments. The school boasts advanced simulators, such as the Airbus A320, and a dedicated team of professionals. Panamedia's reputation and facilities ensure students receive top-quality training, preparing them for successful careers in the aviation industry. Panamedia is committed to providing each student with an optimum flying experience.
services:
["Airline Transport Pilot License
ATPL(A) Course – Integrated Commercial Pilot Course
Modular Commercial Pilot Course
